name: python-collaboration-platform
description: Python協作學習平台 - 支援多人即時協作編程和AI輔助教學

scripts.clean: node -e "console.log('🧹 清理備份文件...'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const files = fs.readdirSync('.'); files.filter(f => f.startsWith('data_backup_')).forEach(f => { fs.unlinkSync(f); console.log('🗑️ 已刪除:', f); }); console.log('✅ 清理完成');"
scripts.backup: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const src = 'data_backup.json'; if(fs.existsSync(src)) { const dest = 'manual_backup_' + new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-') + '.json'; fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('💾 手動備份已創建:', dest); } else { console.log('❌ 找不到備份文件'); }"

author: Python Collaboration Team
